episode.title: かぐや様は交換したい / 藤原ちゃんは出かけたい / 白銀御行は隠したい
Kaguya Wants to Trade / Chika Wants to Go Somewhere / Miyuki Wants to Hide His Ignorance
Kaguya-sama wa Koukan Shitai / Fujiwara-chan wa Dekaketai / Shirogane Miyuki wa Kakushitai
辉夜大小姐想要交换/藤原想出门/白银御行想隐瞒
episode.summary: The students at Shuchiin Academy are under the impression that Shirogane is a veteran when it comes to romantic affairs, and so it is that despite the fact that Shirogane actually has no romantic experience whatsoever, a male student comes to him seeking advice on a matter of the heart. But if the truth about Shirogane`s lack of experience got out, he would lose his dignity as the president of student council. So he nervously takes on the student`s request with false bravado: "If it’s about love, leave it to me!" Kaguya finds herself in a position to surreptitiously eavesdrop and does so as a chance to hear Shirogane’s views on love, but finds his advice off the wall... Source: crunchyroll
